entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publishing R2R for multiple RIDs with AppendRuntimeIdentifierToOutputPath set to false results in the first set of R2R binaries being coped into every RID publish folder #34884
  • [API Compat] Changing a member return type should be detected as a breaking change #34864
    9.0.1xx
  • Container image built using source-built SDK may fail to run #34860
  • NU5128 warning inconsistency? What am I missing? #34859
  • MAUI application throws error when microsoft.intune.maui.essentials.android package is installed. #34857
  • Lots weird things in net20/35 output #34853
  • Implicit framework reference not include System.Windows.Forms for net20 #34852
  • Issue with dotnet build on directory with URL escaped character #34851

Closed

  • "dotnet run" not correctly handling Chinese characters input via Console.ReadLine() in Debug mode #33575

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2250950 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.8.1 in /eng/dependabot #34879
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.8.1 in /eng/dependabot #34878
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Test for aot library with eventpipe #34873
    untriaged, Area-NativeAOT
  • Validate member types #34872
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Validate "this" extension methods and limit visibility #34871
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Containers: prefer starting the app using 'dotnet <assembly.dll>'. #34863
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34854
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update dependabot.yml to target 8.0.1xx #34848
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make illink error less specific #34806
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34819
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Make UseRidGraph property map to runtime config option #34836
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Update our TFM support and error messaging for 17.7 #34585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.8.0 in /eng/dependabot #34788
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.4xx
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
